titles.title: To direct the Securities and Exchange Commission to revise section 230.163 of title 17, United States Code, to apply the exemption offered in such section to communications made by underwriters and dealers acting by or on behalf of a well-known seasoned issuer.
Streamlining Communications for Investors Act
Streamlining Communications for Investors Act
Streamlining Communications for Investors Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
